member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER
member.summary: The BITMAPCOREHEADER structure contains information about the dimensions and color format of a DIB.

member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER.bcSize
member.summary: The number of bytes required by the structure.

member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER.bcWidth
member.summary: The width of the bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER.bcHeight
member.summary: The height of the bitmap, in pixels.

member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER.bcPlanes
member.summary: The number of planes for the target device. This value must be 1.

member.name: BITMAPCOREHEADER.bcBitCount
member.summary: The number of bits-per-pixel. This value must be 1, 4, 8, or 24.
